resume.title:
Have control of your Farm
in the palm of your hand.
resume.first: Our main objective is to help farmers, especially pig and swine breeders.
resume.second: Our system caters to all sizes of farms.
resume.who: If you have 1 pig or pig you can already use our system.

account.advantagesTitle: Just like real cash, but better.
account.businessAccountDetail: Animal Tech allows you to take control of your pig farm. The simple website makes this system efficient for your business, and easy to access for your users.

payment.title: All Your Payment Methods in
payment.detail: Make payments and withdraw funds with a simple, quick and secure away which includes instant banking.
